mapper.sql: select review_no, title, content, picture_name, hits, recommend, to_char(to_date(reg_date, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd')reg_date, member_id from review
mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, title, content, picture_name, hits, recommend, reg_date, member_id) values (#{number}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pictureName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hits}, #{recommend}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd'), #{memberId})
